snippet.title: Skyscraper (スカイスクレーパー) for the NEC PC-88
snippet.description:
Came also out for:

---


Game description:

Skyscraper is an action game where the player has to rescue falling people and parachutists. Objects and enemies fly through the screen and will kill any of them if they come in contact, as well as the helicopter the player is flying. Some enemies will even shoot.

The player doesn't have to rescue all the people but should rescue as many as possible. 

The game is over when the player has no lives left.
